title: PPF1 & PPF2 for iPC OSX86 10.5.6
description:
Some patches that adds some support for devices to the iPC OSX86 iso.

You need to do PPF1 BEFORE you do PPF2!! It's also highly recommended to do all the patches even you don't need the support of devices mentioned below.


PPF1

- Adds support for nForce chipsets on DVD Boot

PPF2

- Additional support for older ICHx chipsets
- Support for ATI SBxxx Chipsets on Boot (Except SB600, this is coming in next PPF)
- Support for Marvell IDE chipsets on boot
